Summary: Shot across sky in front of both moon and clouds surrounding moon, began to slow towards horizon, got smaller then dissappeared.
divs: sighting detailsat approximately 9:10 pm on october 9, 2008, my boyfriend had to leave so we said our goodbyes outside his car near the backyard of my house. i looked up at the moon and saw the clouds giving it that milky blue look and also noticed all the stars that were out. then from behind a pine tree in the side yard, a blue oval-like object shot across in front of the moon and its clouds (very fast as compared to the span of the sky) and it began to slow more as it neared the horizon, i ran into the lawn and watched as the object got smaller and smaller until it dissappeared, never going across the horizon, as if it flew further away from earth. i weighed the possibility of being a plane\jet any fast moving man-made object in the sky, but it was ruled out because it glowed blue and was half the size of the moon
trends: There have been no other sightings in Palos Heights
This sighting has never been favorited.
